meanings.definition: The state or quality of being goopy.
meanings.sent1: The goopinesses of the slime made it difficult to clean up.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally stepped in the goopinesses on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The goopinesses of the melted ice cream made it look like a colorful puddle.
meanings.sent4: The goopinesses of the mud clung to my shoes like glue.
meanings.sent5: The goopinesses of the glue oozed out of the bottle slowly.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that is goopy in nature.
meanings.sent1: She used the goopinesses to create a sticky art project.
meanings.sent2: The goopinesses dripped from the sandwich as she took a bite.
meanings.sent3: The goopinesses of the slime stretched and squished between her fingers.
meanings.sent4: The goopinesses of the melted chocolate coated the strawberries perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The goopinesses of the honey stuck to everything it touched.
